The user can view dashboards that have been shared with them and save the state of dashboard filters as personal views for future use.
userManagement.workspace.permissionGroup: The group members can view dashboards that have been shared with them and save the state of dashboard filters as personal views for future use.
Covers the View permission. Additionally, the user can create, edit, or delete Dashboards and visualisations, and view the LDM and Metrics. They can also export Dashboards to PDF files and tabular Data from visualisations to XLSX and CSV files, and save the state of dashboard filters as personal views for future use.
userManagement.workspace.permissionGroup: Covers the View permission. Additionally, the group members can create, edit, or delete Dashboards and visualisations, and view the LDM and Metrics. They can also export Dashboards to PDF files and tabular Data from visualisations to XLSX and CSV files, and save the state of dashboard filters as personal views for future use.

userManagement.workspace.permission.expo: Adds EXPORT permission to export dashboards and visualizations in various formats.
Adds EXPORT_TABULAR permission to export dashboards and visualizations in CSV and XLSX formats.
Adds EXPORT_PDF permission to export dashboards and visualizations as PDF files.
userManagement.workspace.permission.crea: Adds CREATE_FILTER_VIEW permission to create and save dashboard filter combinations for quick reuse.
Adds CREATE_AUTOMATIONS permission to create automated alerts and scheduled exports.
userManagement.workspace.granularPermiss: Applies the permission to this workspace and all its child workspaces.
Allows users to view dashboards that have been shared with them or their user group.
Allows users to create, edit, or delete dashboards and visualizations, alongside viewing the Logical Data Model (LDM) and metrics.
Allows users can to, edit or delete the logical data model and metrics, and access all dashboards and edit their dashboard permissions without limitations.
Caution: This action will remove any redundant combinations.
